# `inspect` for [debug](/commands/categories/debug.md)

<div class='command-title'>Inspect pipeline results while running a pipeline.</div>

## Signature

```> inspect {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Inspect pipeline results
```nu
> ls | inspect | get name | inspect

```
